name: Momentum (itch) (CodeHat)
description:
The principle is as easy as simple:

Try to thrust a ball as close as possible to the ceiling, without hitting it.

By holding the mouse on the screen you can regulate the force for thrusting the ball.

Features:
- Gravity changes at each shock.
- Currently only one gamemode. More coming soon.

You can find it HERE on the Google Play Store.

Game made with HaxeFlixel.

Sounds made with SFXR.

Follow me for development updates on Twitter:

@CodeHat

Linux and Mac builds are untested!

Please donate if you wanna see more free games like this ;)
